title: useless skin ideas
body:
so riot havent touched kled that much since his release sure they fixed a few bugs but thats about it so i have a suggestion for the next event.
DRAGON TRAINER KLED so his w would set his long axe on fire his e would set them both on fire during the dash and his ult would makes skaarl fly and the speed trail would have fire effects his q would be a spiked hook when mounted and unmounted would look like fire but theres more. dragon trainer yorick could also be a thing where his ghouls are little baby dragons his e would be dragon breath and his w would be a dragon curled around itself his ult would be like the regular maiden but with a dragon head. lastly dragon trainer swain beatrice is a tiny dragon who shoots fire his e puts them on fire his w looks like a dragon calw and his ult makes him look like a dragon im sure this isnt going to do anything but these sound like some really good ideas.

replies.body: maybe dragon sorceress xayah and rakan you can let your imagination do the work for those ones
